name: Z: The End
description: Z: The End is a survival game set in a world infested with zombies with the perspective of a top down shooter. Explore a world destroyed by disease, scavenge for food, drinks, and weapons and survive as long as you can against the zombies and nature.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intergrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space
